mapper.insert: insert into room ( num , subject , content , caution , room_type , reg_date , post_num , addr1 , addr2 , thumbnail , key_value , facility_content , active ) values ( #{num} , #{subject}, #{content} , #{caution} , #{room_type} , sysdate , #{post_num} , #{addr1} , #{addr2} , #{thumbnail} , #{key_value} , #{facility_content}, #{active} )
insert into room_photo(photo_num , photo , num ) values (room_photo_seq.nextval , #{photo} , #{num} )

insert into room_detail(detail_num , people , price , discount , name , content , detail_photo , point , num ) values (room_detail_seq.nextval , #{people} , #{price} , #{discount} , #{name} , #{detail_content} , #{detail_photo} , #{point} , #{num} )
